response.overview: When she was assassinated by some unknown gunmen at a party in his honor, the main character became the target because he had incriminating footage that could nail them. He is framed, and soon the police is also after him. He is on his heels running from the assailants and the police. Will he be able to prove his innocence or will he go down for a sin not committed? This movie is a story of love, emotion, and double cross beyond bounds.
response.title: SAVING RAYMOND
